alert.note: Alert for Bourbon; Crawford (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 5:02PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bourbon and northwestern Crawford Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 502 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hepler, or 10 miles north of Girard, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marmaton, Uniontown, Redfield, Hepler, Hiattville, Petersburg, Farlington, Brazilton, Porterville and Pawnee Station. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
